name: OR_LOG_PSTOP_NURSE
description: The OR_LOG_PSTOP_NURSE table contains OR management system log postop nurses.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the post-op nurse refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the post-op nurse in the surgical log

columns.name: POSTOP_NURSES_ID
columns.description: The ID of nurse assigned to post-op for the surgery.
